content.question: Which of the following historical processes most directly contributed to reactions like those depicted in the excerpt?

choices.label: Efforts to contain the spread of communism following the Second World War
Attempts to secure United States oil supplies from the Middle East
Rejection of Great Society programs meant to combat poverty
Decline in public confidence in government following political scandals

content.answer: Efforts to contain the spread of communism following the Second World War

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
